div.em: Current conditions as of 26 Apr 14:52 pm CDT

div.div: A 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms after 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 55. Southeast wind 3 to 7 mph.
A 40 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms, mainly before 1pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 73. Breezy, with a south wind 13 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.
A 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms after 1am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 59. South wind around 10 mph.
